front.title: IEEE Approved Standard for Low-Rate Wireless Networks --Amendment 2: Ultra-Low Power Physical Layer
front.abstract: Two alternate physical layers (PHYs), TASK and RS-GFSK, are specified in this amendment in addition to the PHYs of IEEE Std 802.15.4-2015. The amendment also defines the medium access control (MAC) modifications needed to support the implementation of the TASK and RS-GFSK PHYs. These alternate PHYs enable low-cost, ultra-low power consumption, as well as extended battery life, in various frequency bands and geographical regions under multiple regulatory domains. (The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the IEEE GET program. http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7466448/)
